name: Magical Bubble Shot
description:
Magical Bubble Shot can train your brain and solve the color ball challenges.

Much Fun and Easy Playing:
- Completely FREE
- Fascination and super easy gameplay
- 1000+ Well-designed classic pop levels
- many free magical props or power-ups
- create stunning chain reactions and get 3-stars
- Take aim , tap and tilt bubbles in line of sight, and make an accurate shot when you shoot all bubbles.
